channel.title: Christelle Chaudet on Silvano DAL ZILIO
channel.description: Recent content in Christelle Chaudet on Silvano DAL ZILIO

item.title: Formal Verification of AADL Specifications in the Topcased Environment
item.author: dalzilio [at] laas [dot] fr (Silvano DAL ZILIO)
item.description: We describe a formal verification toolchain for AADL, the SAE Architecture Analysis and Design Language, enriched with its behavioral annex. Our approach is based on tools that are integrated in the Topcased environment. We give a high-level view of the tools involved and illustrate the successive transformations that take place during the verification process.
